title: IGT Presents Winning Combination of Games, Systems and Solutions at G2E 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/21/2015 @ 1:05 PM Companies mentioned in this article: IGT 
LONDON, Sept. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- International Game Technology PLC ("IGT") (NYSE: IGT) will unveil its Winning Combination of games, systems and solutions designed for all regulated gaming channels and segments at the 2015 Global Gaming Expo (G2E) Sept. 29 - Oct. 1 at the Sands Expo and Convention Center in Las Vegas, Nev. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20150406/196736LOGO 
"At G2E 2015, IGT will reveal the next generation of games, systems and solutions designed to propel our customers' business forward, increase player engagement, and set a new standard for innovation in the gaming industry," said Renato Ascoli, IGT CEO North America Gaming & Interactive (DoubleDown Casino) . "As North America's largest gaming trade show, G2E sets the ideal stage for IGT to demonstrate its industry leadership and Customer First focus in action. From casino to lottery, to social and interactive games, IGT's product portfolio across multiple platforms is as unique and diverse as the valued customers and players that we serve." 
IGT's booth #2139 will inject life-changing excitement into G2E by offering the chance to win $1,000,000. Gaming industry operators and their direct employees will each be granted one spin on an IGT Megaslot machine, with one potential million-dollar jackpot being awarded. 
Highlights from IGT's 2015 G2E games, systems and solutions portfolio include: 
Increased depth in TRUE 3D(TM) game portfolio: IGT will expand its award-winning TRUE 3D product line with the introduction of several new 3D titles that deliver glasses-free 3D gaming entertainment. A marquee product will be IGT's Wheel of Fortune(®) Double Diamond(®) 3D game, the ultimate "Winning Combination" of the most successful slot theme of all time and IGT's widely popular TRUE 3D technology. The Plants vs. Zombies(TM) 3D Ancient Egypt , Cash Fever(TM) 3D, Reef of Riches(TM) 3D , Grit, Guns and Gold(TM) 3D and Return of the Sphinx(TM) 3D games are among IGT's TRUE 3D titles to be on display at G2E. 
New spins on Wheel of Fortune(®) slots library: IGT will add several new titles to the Company's legendary Wheel of Fortune slots portfolio. The Wheel of Fortune Gold Spins(TM) Double Diamond game will debut on IGT's new hardware solution, the CrystalWheel(TM) Stepper cabinet . The CrystalWheel Stepper cabinet melds the mechanical reels from IGT's S3000((TM) )cabinet with the pristine video presentation of IGT's CrystalCore((TM)) cabinet, and is topped with an iconic, physical Wheel of Fortune wheel. IGT will also introduce Wheel of Fortune New Orleans slots. Housed on the CrystalWheel cabinet, this Mardi Gras-inspired game theme transports players to the Big Easy as they vie for the game's five progressive jackpots. 
Thrilling new licensed themes: IGT will continue its tradition of bringing pop culture's hottest brands to the casino floor with the introduction of several new licensed slot themes. IGT partnered with Warner Bros. and the number one brand in entertainment news to bring TMZ Video Slots to life. This interactive theme is housed on the CrystalCore cabinet and introduces never-before-seen camera-based "photo booth" technology that integrates a player's image on the game screen and in several engaging bonus events. Inspired by one of Netflix's most-watched programs, IGT will unveil House of Cards Power and Money Video Slots and House of Cards Welcome to Washington Video Slots . Other must-see licensed titles from IGT include The Dark Knight(TM) Trilogy Video Slots: Super Heroes and Villains, Breaking Bad(TM) Video Slots, The Ellen DeGeneres Show(TM) Have a Little Fun Today Video Slots, and a fourth game to the James Cameron's AVATAR(TM) video slots series, James Cameron's AVATAR(TM) The Sacred Bond Video Slots. 
Hot new innovations for the S3000 cabinet: IGT is making the award-winning S3000 cabinet even more sensational with the introduction of the Spin Ferno((TM) ) tournament solution (,) the world's first automated tournament technology system for a spinning reel cabinet. Fueled by IGT's Tournament Manager 5.0, the Spin Ferno product enables operators to host single or multi-site slot tournaments on the celebrated S3000 cabinet. IGT will also introduce an array of new titles for the S3000 cabinet including the Mucho Dinero((TM) ) game , the all-new Hot Hit(TM) Game Series and many more. 
Expanded content portfolio for the CrystalDual cabinet: IGT will debut a variety of games for the globally relevant CrystalDual cabinet that reflect the Company's ongoing commitment to meaningful innovation. IGT will highlight new CrystalDual cabinet game themes such as: the Da Vinci Diamonds(TM) DualPlay game, inspired by IGT's highly successful Interactive title by the same name, the Mammoth Reels(TM) game series, the Age of Aurora(TM) game series and the Bubble Craze(TM) game , a unique game that first launched as an Interactive title and features colorful bubbles to make up the game's 19 independent "reels." 
Sensational light and sound hardware technology: IGT will light up its booth with SyncSation , a unique tool that enables operators to deploy choreographed light and sound shows across multiple IGT hardware solutions including the S3000 and CrystalDual cabinets. With SyncSation, operators can create attention-grabbing light and sound spectacles in one or multiple locations on their casino floors, ranging from mild to sensational. 
An elevated video poker experience: IGT will take the video poker experience to the next level with the introduction of the Ultimate X Poker((TM) )with Power Deals(TM) Tournament Game. Fueled by Tournament Manager 4.0, Ultimate X Poker with Power Deals Tournament Game enables operators to host spirited video poker tournament games on their casino floors. The Company will also introduce a series of new video poker titles such as the Super Hand Poker(TM) game and the Super Draw 6 Card Poker(TM) game, an innovative game that gives players the chance to win a six-of-a-kind poker hand. 
Leading content on IGT's DoubleDown Casino: As the gaming industry's leading social casino, IGT's DoubleDown Casino(®) app will continue its rich tradition of cross-platform content creation and deployment by launching a marquee licensed title, at the same time the land-based game is introduced. 
Comprehensive systems solutions: IGT will emphasize its new HTML5 support capabilities and several of the Company's systems solutions including Floor Manager and Service Window. IGT will prominently feature the Company's IGT Advantage((TM)) system and its ability to integrate with IGT's DoubleDown Casino app. Other standout mobile systems solutions from IGT include Mobile Host software and Mobile Responder application, and a suite of Intelligent Bonuses including Point Pursuit((TM)) and Intelligent Rewards bonuses. 
Interactive solutions across platforms: In the Interactive arena, IGT will demonstrate OnPremise(TM) software, an integrated mobile technology solution that modernizes gaming experiences and enables players to place a variety of wagers, including sports bets, slot wagers, bingo and keno, via a single mobile app anytime within set boundaries at a casino or lottery retailer. IGT will also spotlight the Company's Play-for-Fun solution and its ability to monetize virtual currency, while also positioning operators favorably for the expansion of real money mobile gaming. IGT will further the Company's cross-platform content distribution strategy with the introduction of MegaJackpots(®) Cleopatra((TM)) and MegaJackpots Siberian Storm((TM) )games -- two titles that originated in the land-based casino environment, and have been tremendously popular in the UK online gaming segment. 
Unique gaming offerings: In addition to traditional casino games and products, IGT will feature a series of gaming solutions for tribal, lottery and live table game environments. Class II games, public gaming video lottery terminals, and live and Electronic Table Games (ETGs) from IGT distribution partner LT Game (a subsidiary of Paradise Entertainment) will each have dedicated areas in IGT's booth. 
For more information, visit IGT or go to Facebook at facebook.com/IGT , follow us on Twitter, twitter.com/IGTnews or watch IGT videos on YouTube, youtube.com/igt . Play IGT's DoubleDown Casino app on Facebook or at doubledowncasino.com . 
About IGT IGT (NYSE: IGT ) is the global leader in gaming. We enable players to experience their favorite games across all channels and regulated segments, from Gaming Machines and Lotteries to Interactive and Social Gaming. Leveraging a wealth of premium content, substantial investment in innovation, in-depth customer intelligence, operational expertise and leading-edge technology, our gaming solutions anticipate the demands of consumers wherever they decide to play. We have a well-established local presence and relationships with governments and regulators in more than 100 countries around the world, and create value by adhering to the highest standards of service, integrity, and responsibility. IGT has more than 13,000 employees. For more information, please visit www.merger.igt.com .
